com.atoito.clap.api

Interface Configuration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfiguration

    public interface Configuration
    Main configuration container. The actual configuration parsing is done by an injected ConfigurationReader implementation.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • get

        <T> T get(java.lang.String key)
        Get a configuration value
        Parameters:
        key -
        Returns:
        the value of the specified key, implicitly casted as required or null if something goes wrong

      • get

        <T> T get(java.lang.String key,
          T devaultValue)
        Get a configuration value
        Parameters:
        key -
        devaultValue -
        Returns:
        the value of the specified key, or devaultValue or if configuration has not the key.

      • getPaths

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> getPaths()
        Returns:
        a map with, as keys the paths to the configuration files, and values if the file is found.

      • addPath

        void addPath(java.lang.String configurationPath)

      • getAllProperties

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAllProperties()
        Returns:
        a map of all properties in the configuration holder.

      • getDedicatedInstance

        Configuration getDedicatedInstance(java.lang.String configurationPath)
        Parameters:
        configurationPath -
        Returns:
        a configuration object with properties from only the given configurationPath.
